name: Crocodile
types: The Seven Warlords of the Sea
text:
All of your opponent's Characters cannot be removed from the field by your effects.
Activate:Main Once Per Turn You may K.O. 1 of your Characters with a type including "Baroque Works": Give up to 1 of your opponent's Characters -10 cost during this turn. Then, trash 2 cards from the top of your deck.

effect.text: All of your opponent's Characters cannot be removed from the field by your effects.
You may K.O. 1 of your Characters with a type including "Baroque Works": Give up to 1 of your opponent's Characters -10 cost during this turn. Then, trash 2 cards from the top of your deck.
